start: This is hello text in english
lang_on_start:
Is your language English?
If not, type /lang to change language

lang.name: English
lang.question: What language do you want to use?

start.text:
Is remaider should be repeated?
Events like birthdays, anniversaries are repeated.

repeat.text: How often should the reminder be repeated?

calendar_1.text: Select the date of the reminder

send_time.multiple:
Send the time of the reminder as HH:MM.
Example: 12:00 or 12.00

Also you can send multiple times like this:
12:00, 13.00, 14.00 (max 5 times)
send_time.single:
Send the time of the reminder as HH:MM.
Example: 12:00 or 12.00

send_reminder_name.text: Send the name of the reminder

send_reminder_text.text: Send the text of the reminder

has_it_beforehand.text:
Do you want to set a reminder before the event?
For example, if you set a reminder for a birthday, you can set a reminder for a week before the birthday.

select_beforehand_time.text: Select how much time before the event should the reminder be set

custom_beforehand_time.text:
Send the time before the event.
Example: 5 days
supported time units: hours, days, weeks, months

calendar_month.text:
Select day/days of the reminder
You can select one or more days by clicking on them

calendar_weekdays.text:
Select day/days of the reminder
You can select one or more days by clicking on them
